mapper.select: select permission_id as id, permission_name as name, icon, code, iorder, parent_id as "parentId", permission_type as "permissionType", link_url as "linkUrl", display from v_sys_permission vsp where 1=1 [[ and permission_name like #permissionName# ]] [[ and permission_type = #permissionType# ]] [[ and display = #display# ]] [[ and exists ( select 1 from sys_role_permission srp where vsp.permission_id = srp.permission_id and exists ( select 1 from sys_user_role sur where srp.role_id = sur.role_id and sur.user_id = #userId# ) ) ]] [[ and permission_id not in(#notExistsMenuIds#) ]] order by iorder
select permission_id, permission_name, icon, code, display, iorder, parent_id, permission_type, link_url from v_sys_permission where permission_id in(#ids#)
select count(1) from v_sys_permission where code = #code# [[ and permission_id != #permissionId# ]]
